name: Intraliminal
description:
CW: Loneliness, childhood trauma, implications of bullying and child abuse/neglect, discussions on violence

Intraliminal is a narrative exploration game made in Bistsy3D. You play as a child exploring the liminal backrooms while their older self narrates the story of their journey and reflects on their complicated and lonely childhood. 

The game takes inspiration from my own childhood and experiences growing up and acts as an exploration of the sort of person I could have ended up being if my life had turned out differently. A darker, lonelier, and angrier version of myself. This was combined with stories of other people who took this darker path and what led them to become bitter adults. 

Controls: Use WASD/Arrow Keys to navigate, walk into highlighted objects to interact, walk into the dark to progress.

Video to the right is a complete playthrough.
